Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Sedgwick
ShortDescription: 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Orleans, Clybourn, Larrabee, North Avenue and Sedgwick: due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Sedgwick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Orleans, Clybourn, Larrabee, North Avenue, Sedgwick and over regular route, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Sedgwick.

Allow extra travel time.
